channel.title: How do i edit shop items? and shops
channel.description:
How do i change item, or add items, in a shop? Or even better create my own!
Hey my server name is deadlyspecz, i have currently done a little coding but not much. I am looking for a dedicated, trust worthy [b]CODER[/b]. I will automatically place you on staff for being a coder.
post here, or pm me on msn: Graff_is_art@hotmail.com

item.title: How do i edit shop items? and shops

@Deadly-specz wrote:
